eAnnotations.source:
0) "option space" dependencies, competing characterizations
1) original block hierarchy H 1.a) apply inheritance pattern to H 1.b) create deep copy of H, H' apply inheritance pattern to H' 1.c) BST H into H'' apply inheritance pattern to H''
Where to put values? - redefine all value properties from facet and populate default values - create for analysis an instance tree and populate slots
2) create instance tree of H 2.b) apply multi-classification to instance need a script which understands the dependency characterization and created multi-classification to instance base don dependency
